envMsg: This record is from BCH-Dev (test environment)

description.en: Cartagena Protocol on Biosafety National Focal Points (responsible for liaising with the Secretariat), Biosafety Clearing-House National Focal Points (responsible for publishing information in the BCH), Emergency Measures Contact Points (responsible for receiving notifications under Art. 17).
Entities designated by governments to perform the administrative functions required by the Protocol (Article 19).
Entities designated to perform the functions set out in Article 5 of the Nagoya - Kuala Lumpur Supplementary Protocol on Liability and Redress.

title.en: Biosafety Law, Regulation, Guidelines and Agreements

description.en: Legal, administrative and other measures to implement the Cartagena Protocol and any bilateral, regional and multilateral agreements regarding the intentional transboundary movement of living modified organisms.

title.en: Country's Decision or any other Communication

description.en: National decisions, notifications, declarations or communications under the Cartagena Protocol.

title.en: Risk Assessment generated by a regulatory process

description.en: Summaries of risk assessments or environmental reviews of living modified organisms generated by a regulatory process and carried out in accordance with Article 15.
National websites and databases related to biosafety.

title.en: Fourth National Report on the Implementation of the Cartagena Protocol on Biosafety
title.ar: التقرير الوطني الرابع حول تنفيذ بروتوكول قرطاجنة للسلامة الأحيائية
title.ru: Четвёртый национальный доклад об осуществлении Картахенского протокола по биобезопасности
title.fr: Quatrième rapport national sur l'application du Protocole de Cartagena sur la biosécurité
title.es: Cuarto informe nacional sobre la aplicación del Protocolo de Cartagena sobre Seguridad de la Biotecnología
title.zh: 《卡塔赫纳生物安全议定书》执行情况第四次国家报告

description.en: Fourth National Reports on the Implementation of the Cartagena Protocol on Biosafety (due 1 October 2019)

description.en: Third National Reports on the Implementation of the Cartagena Protocol on Biosafety (due 31 October 2015)

description.en: Interim National Reports on the Implementation of the Cartagena Protocol on Biosafety (due 11 September 2005)
Biosafety experts in the roster of experts.
Country Profile for Biosafety Clearing-House
Contact details of a person or organization.
Biosafety Information Resource Centre
Organizations involved in activities relevant to the Cartagena Protocol on Biosafety with summaries of their activities and contact information.

title.en: Laboratory for detection and identification of LMOs

description.en: Laboratories involved in the detection and identification of LMOs.

Living modified organisms, including information on the introduced genetic elements, parental and donor organisms, biotechnological traits, transformation event, the unique identification code (if available) and detection methods.
Information on introduced genetic elements, including donor organism, type of genetic element, biological function and biotechnological trait.
Information on parental, recipient and donor organisms related to the living modified organisms and genetic elements registered in the BCH.

title.en: Risk Assessment generated by an independent or non-regulatory process

description.en: Summaries of a risk assessment or environmental review of living modified organisms other than those generated by a regulatory process.
Submissions from Parties, other Governments or relevant organizations in response to notifications issued by the Secretariat.
Information on capacity-building initiatives at national, regional and international levels, including activities and outcomes.
News related to the Biosafety Clearing-House.
